summary: The module implements a set of output writers that transform datastore records into different serialised formats such as JSON, plain text (CSV/TSV) and XML. Each writer manages the creation, incremental population and finalisation of the target stream, handling encoding details and formatâ€‘specific structure.
business_intent: Provide a reusable mechanism for exporting datastore query results in multiple file formats so that they can be downloaded, shared or processed by external systems.
